segments.text: Whoa, I didn't expect to see the sink overflowing like that!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely zoned out, polishing her plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring onto the floor in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over there, a boy is climbing the stool to the cookie jarâ€”wow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are spreading out; that's unexpected instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in one hand, reaching with the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, arm up like she's catching a prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors swing open, framing the whole sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the garden so vividly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never thought kids would attempt this right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's widening faster than I imagined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is full of hidden surprises everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR
